cards.name: Craft Firestone
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Firestone Rune with 4 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
runesmith:Enhance a ~~- random  -~~ card in your hand.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Aqua Decay
cards.description:
Lose all runesmith:Aqua.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Terra equal to runesmith:Aqua lost.

cards.name: Ignis Decay
cards.description:
Lose all runesmith:Ignis.
Gain runesmith:Terra and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Ignis lost.

cards.name: Terra Decay
cards.description:
Lose all runesmith:Terra.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Terra lost.

cards.name: Backup Battery
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) (5) (7) (10) of each runesmith:Element.
Draw 1 card.
Can be Upgraded 4 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Chisel Stab
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) Damage.
Gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Craft Magma
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Magma Rune with 4 (6) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Protectio
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with 3 (4) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Earth Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
Gain 2 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Energized Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 3 (4) damage.
Gain 3 (4) Block.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Grindstone
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
This (For) turn (2 turns), whenever you play a card,
Upgrade it.
runesmith:Enhance the card if it cannot be Upgraded.

cards.name: Hammer Throw
cards.description:
Deal 5 (6) damage.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards) and Upgrade it (them).

cards.name: Heat Exchange
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
This card gains 1 (2) additional damage for each of your runesmith:Ignis.
Lose 1 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Heated Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Makeshift Armor
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile.
Gain 11 (15) Block.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Overpower
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage.
runesmith:Downgrade 2 random cards in your hand.

cards.name: Repurpose
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Attack: Gain 2 (3) runesmith:Ignis.
Skill: Gain 2 (3) runesmith:Terra.
Power: Gain 2 (3) runesmith:Aqua.
Status: Gain 1 of each. ( Curse: Gain 2 of each. )

cards.name: Rune Hurl
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to deal 10 (14) damage.
If you don't have any Runes, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shifting Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage twice.
runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand.

cards.name: Static Cage
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your hand.
Gain 7 (10) Block.

cards.name: Unstable Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.
Gain 1 random runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Accelerate
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
Draw 1 card.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to draw 1 (2) more card.

cards.name: Attraction
cards.description:
Put 1 (2) runesmith:Craft card from draw or discard pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Augment
cards.description:
Gain 10 (14) Block.
Lose all (half)  (your ) runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 Artifact for every (each) ~~- 2  -~~ runesmith:Aqua lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Chaotic Blast
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage to ALL enemies.
1 (2) of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft 1 (2) random Rune (Runes).

cards.name: Charged Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
runesmith:Break your oldest runesmith:Dud Rune to runesmith:Craft a random non-Dud Rune.

cards.name: Craft Incendium
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Incendium Rune with 4 (6) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Obretio
cards.description:
2 runesmith:Terra 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Obretio Rune with 3 (4) runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Craft Reservo
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a Reservo (+) Rune.

cards.name: Craft Spiculum
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Spiculum Rune with 3 (4) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Vitae
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Vitae Rune with 5 (7) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Discharge
cards.description: runesmith:Break your oldest non-Dud Rune to gain 12 (16) Block, deal 12 (16) damage, and runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.

cards.name: Double Up
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance 1 (2) card (cards) in your hand.

cards.name: Electrocute
cards.description:
Deal 11 (14) damage.
Take 3 (2) damage.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Elementary Particles
cards.description: Choose an runesmith:Element to runesmith:Decay. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Empowerment
cards.description:
Gain Strength equal to your runesmith:Ignis this turn.
Gain Dexterity equal to your runesmith:Terra this turn.

cards.name: Fiery Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) (17) (22) (28) (35) (43) (52) (62) (73) damage to ALL enemies.
Can be Upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Firestorm
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Firewall
cards.description:
Gain 12 (15) Block.
3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft 2 runesmith:Firestone Runes with 2 (3) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Frozen Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 11 (13) damage.
Apply 1 Slow.
Apply 3 (4) runesmith:Ice-Cold.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Go With The Flow
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Gain 2 (3) runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hammer Time
cards.description:
~~-   -~~ Deal 14 (15) damage.
runesmith:Enhance ALL your other cards containing "Hammer" ( twice).

cards.name: Hammer and Chisel
cards.description:
Add a random  (Upgraded ) Hammer card and a random  (Upgraded ) Chisel card into your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lithium Ion
cards.description: Gain 2 (3) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Malloc
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade a card in your hand.
If the card is Upgraded, gain [E] ( [E]).
Draw 1 card for each level of runesmith:Enhancement.

cards.name: Nanites Cloud
cards.description:
ALL characters lose 13 (18) Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Negative Space
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block, reduced by 2 Block for each active Rune.
Deal 3 (4) damage for each active Rune.

cards.name: One for Everyone
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to
gain [E] , gain 1 Block,
deal 1 damage,
apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies,
gain 1 of each runesmith:Element and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Perfect Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Gain 1 of each runesmith:Element.
Gain 1 (2) runesmith:Potency this turn.

cards.name: Permafrost
cards.description:
Lose at most half your Block at the start of your turn.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Powered Anvil
cards.description: Whenever you runesmith:Enhance a card, runesmith:Enhance it 1 additional time. ( runesmith:Enhance a card in your hand. )

cards.name: Prism
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to 2 (3) times the number of all your runesmith:Elements.
Lose half your runesmith:Elements.

cards.name: Refine
cards.description:
runesmith:Enhance a card X (+1) times.
Refund 1.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Upgrade  ( and runesmith:Enhance  ) all cards in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Retool
cards.description:
Shuffle all Upgraded or runesmith:Enhanced cards from your discard pile into your draw pile. 
Draw 3 (4) cards.

cards.name: Runic Blueprint
cards.description:
Add a random runesmith:Craft card into your hand.
It costs 0 and does not need runesmith:Elements this turn.
Gain 2 runesmith:Aqua.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Superposition
cards.description:
Deal 26 (34) damage.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to gain 13 (18) Block.

cards.name: Terraform
cards.description:
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.
Gain Block equals to 2 (3) times the number of your runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: White Balance
cards.description: Deal damage equals to 4 (5) times the number of runesmith:Elements gained this turn.

cards.name: Arc Reactor
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) runesmith:Potency.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Whenever you runesmith:Craft a Rune, lose 2 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Industria
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an Industria (+) Rune.

cards.name: Craft Medicinae
cards.description:
5 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Medicinae Rune with 2 (3) runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Craft Prismatica
cards.description: 2 of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft a Prismatica (+) Rune.

cards.name: Creator Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Enhance 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Duct Tape
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Stasis up to 1 (2) card.

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description: This turn, create a copy of the next Rune (2)  (Runes ) you runesmith:Craft.

cards.name: Fission Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune twice.

cards.name: Generate Forcefield
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your X (+1) oldest non-Dud Runes. Prevent the next time you would lose HP for each Rune runesmith:Broken.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grand Slam
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand ( twice).

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
runesmith:Downgrade ALL your cards.
ALL cards cost 1 less and Exhaust.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lightning Rod
cards.description: For 2 (3) turns, you lose runesmith:Elements before losing HP. Gain 2 (3) of each runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Metallurgical Research
cards.description:
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance ALL your cards after 3 (2) turns (turn).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Replicating Barrier
cards.description:
2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with 2 (3) runesmith:Potency.
Every 2 turns, 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with 2 (3) runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Supernova
cards.description:
runesmith:Break all your Runes.
Draw 1 card and gain [E] for each non-Dud Rune runesmith:Broken.

cards.name: Unlimited Power
cards.description:
Increase ALL runesmith:Element gains by 1.
Gain 1 of each runesmith:Element.

relics.name: Broken Ruby
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.
At the start of your turn, Enhance a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A crystal that resembles a red gem. Although it is broken, faint energy still remains.

relics.name: AutoHammer
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in 1 turn, runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: An automatic hammer which never stops hammering.

relics.name: Emergency Provisions
relics.description: Every time you play a Craft card, gain 1 random runesmith:Element.
relics.flavorText: A self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging.

relics.name: Minicore
relics.description: Gain 1 runesmith:Potency at the start of the combat.
relics.flavorText: This peculiar orb was once used as an energy storage.

relics.name: Nanobots
relics.description: At the start of combat, runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand.

relics.name: Locket
relics.description: One time each combat, if your health drops below 15%, Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance ALL your cards for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: An image of unknown yet familiar figure resides within.

relics.name: Core Crystal
relics.description: Replaces Broken Ruby. All runesmith:Element gains are increased by 50%. Raises maximum runesmith:Elements to 20.
relics.flavorText: The crystal surges with new life.

relics.name: Pocket Reactor
relics.description: runesmith:Elements are no longer needed for crafting. All cards lose 2 runesmith:Potency.

relics.name: Uranium Anvil
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. runesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile each turn.
relics.flavorText: This block of metal holds massive amount of energy but weakens anyone who comes near it.

keywords.name: Elements
keywords.description: Elements (Ignis, Terra and Aqua) are spent to Craft Runes and are used for other utilities.

keywords.name: Break
keywords.description: Destroy a Rune and activate its effect twice. Power-based effects will be removed before the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Craft
keywords.description: Create a Rune using Elements. If the Rune cannot be crafted, gain that many Elements instead. You can have no more than 7 active Runes.

keywords.name: Decay
keywords.description: Lose all selected Element, then gain other Elements equals to the amount lost.

keywords.name: Downgrade
keywords.description: Remove one level of Upgrade and any Enhance or Stasis from a card.

keywords.name: Enhance
keywords.description: Increase damage, Block and Potency of a card by 50%. Can be stacked additively. Enhance is removed after the card is played.

keywords.name: Firestone
keywords.description: Rune: Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Ice-Cold
keywords.description:
Decrease attack damage by 1 per stack. Stack is reduced by 1 at the end of turn.
Remove Slow when stack reaches 0.

keywords.name: Incendium
keywords.description: Rune: Deals damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Magma
keywords.description: Rune: Deals damage to random enemy and gain Block.

keywords.name: Medicinae
keywords.description: Rune: Heals on Break or at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Obretio
keywords.description: Rune: Reduces an enemy Strength for a turn.

keywords.name: Potency
keywords.description: Potency is the power of a Rune when it is Crafted.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description: Prevent a card from losing Enhancement when played.

keywords.name: Vitae
keywords.description: Rune: Lose Potency of the Rune instead of HP.

mods.name: The Runesmith
mods.credits:
BDWSSBB - Card descriptions wording improvements.
Dalamzi - Korean translation.
Rita-Bernstein - Chinese translation.
Slathos - Polish translation.
mods.description: Add a new class called the Runesmith
